name: Amazon EC2 M5a Instances
short: These are part of the Amazon EC2 instances family that provide a balance of compute, memory, and networking resources for a broad range of workloads.
description: Amazon EC2 M5a Instances are part of the Amazon EC2 service, providing a balance of cost and performance for a variety of workloads. They are powered by AMD EPYC processors, offering a lower cost per vCPU compared to M5 instances. These instances come with NVMe SSD storage, high-speed networking, and up to 96 vCPUs, catering to high-performance computing. Ideal for business applications, data processing tasks, and backend servers, M5a instances help users optimize their resources without compromising performance.
